basics.name: Ellie Rapp
basics.summary: Currently employed at Nathan Kline Institute. CWRU Class of 2023, Clinical Psychology PhD Applicant.

education.area: Bachelors of Arts in Psychology (honors), Cognitive Science, Behavioral Neuroscience, and Chemistry

publications.name: The Relationship between Subjective Cognitive Decline and Objective Cognitive Performance in Older Adults with Treatment-Resistant Late-life Depression: The Role of Depression Severity
publications.publisher: The American Journal of Geriatric Psychiatry
publications.summary: SCD reported by participants with TRLLD and individuals who know them well, relates to worse cognitive performance in a broad range of domains, independent of depression severity.

publications.name: Cognitive Deficits in Late-Life Depression: From Symptoms and Assessment to Therapeutics
publications.summary: This review provides an updated conceptual and practical framework for clinicians evaluating and treating LLD.
